## Vector3.axisNY() method

Creates a new Vector3 pointing in the negative direction of the Y axis, i.e. vec3(0, -1, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisNY(): Vector3;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The new vector
